members.description: Version Number

members.name: name

constantValues: Type a descriptive title for the sales literature.

members.description: Type a descriptive title for the sales literature.

members.name: processId

constantValues: Contains the id of the process associated with the entity.

members.description: Contains the id of the process associated with the entity.

members.name: stageId

constantValues: Contains the id of the stage where the entity is located.

members.description: Contains the id of the stage where the entity is located.

members.name: traversedPath

constantValues: A comma separated list of string values representing the unique identifiers of stages in a Business Process Flow Instance in the order that they occur.

members.name: description

constantValues: Type additional information to describe the sales literature, such as the intended audience or primary messages.

members.description: Type additional information to describe the sales literature, such as the intended audience or primary messages.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: id

constantValues: Choose the user who is responsible for maintaining or updating the sales literature.

members.name: expirationDate

constantValues: Enter the expiration date or last day the sales literature can be distributed.

members.description: Enter the expiration date or last day the sales literature can be distributed.

members.name: hasAttachments

constantValues: Tells whether the sales literature has one or more attachments.

members.description: Tells whether the sales literature has one or more attachments.

members.name: isCustomerViewable

constantValues: Select whether the sales literature can be distributed to prospects and customers or is for internal use only.

members.description: Select whether the sales literature can be distributed to prospects and customers or is for internal use only.

members.name: keyWords

members.description: Type one or more topics or keywords that can be used to search for the sales literature.

members.name: literatureTypeCode

constantValues: Select a category or type to help others identify the intended use of the sales literature.

addSupportingAttribute.name: literatureTypeCode_display

members.name: subjectId

constantValues: Choose the subject for the sales literature to relate the item to a product or business group. Administrators can configure subjects under Business Management in the Settings area.

members.description: Choose the subject for the sales literature to relate the item to a product or business group. Administrators can configure subjects under Business Management in the Settings area.

members.name: exchangeRate

constantValues: Shows the conversion rate of the record's currency. The exchange rate is used to convert all money fields in the record from the local currency to the system's default currency.

members.description: Shows the conversion rate of the record's currency. The exchange rate is used to convert all money fields in the record from the local currency to the system's default currency.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: id

constantValues: Choose the local currency for the record to make sure budgets are reported in the correct currency.
